name: Tank UP
description:
Command your tanks to defend yourself against the endless spawning enemies. Can you kill them all?

Tank UP is a turn based strategy game created for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1 . Each tank has its own strengths, weaknesses and unique effects. Merge tanks of the same kind together to make them even stronger!

Use WASD to navigate around the map and the mouse buttons to command your tanks.

Thanks for playing!
